title: Weeknight Dinners
content: The Fall season is now upon us, which means back to school and back to the work grind. When we get home from a long day, the last thing we want to think about is cooking an elaborate dinner. Thank goodness for Woman’s Day, who has provided us with some delicious and simple meals we can make QUICK. Our fantastic prop stylist, Courtney de Wet, worked on the story with photographer Steve Giralt and food stylist Michelle Gatton. You can scope the recipes below!
